pkgmetadata.longdescription: # libcgroup - low level Python binding for [libcgroup](http://libcg.sourceforge.net/)- [libcgroup](http://libcg.sourceforge.net/) is a library that abstracts the [control group file system](http://lwn.net/Articles/236038/) in Linux.- Matches one-to-one with libcgroup's API and provides type info via stub.## Install shared library### Debian (e.g. Ubuntu)```bashapt install libcgroup1```### Red Hat```bashyum install libcgroup```### Arch Linux (AUR)```bash<AUR Helper> -S libcgroup```
